annotation.text: Angle formed by two arrows in the coordinate plane beginning at the origin and terminating along a unit circle.
An arrow from the origin pointing directly right along the x-axis
An arrow from the origin pointing up and right
The angle is labeled pi over 3
The point at the end of the arrow is labeled x sub 1 comma y sub 1
A circle of radius 1 centered at the origin. The ends of both arrows lie on the circle.
